row.Text: not sure why this is getting downvoted -- it is correct! Double check it in your compiler if you don't believe him!
Yeah, I didn't believe it until I created a console app - but good lord! Why would they give you the rope to hang yourself! I hated that about VB.NET - the OrElse and AndAlso keywords!

I don't see an accepted answer now, I wonder how that got unaccepted. Incidentally, I would have marked an accepted answer based on the answers available at the time. Also, accepted doesn't mean Best :)
Jonathan: Wow! Thank you for all of that, you did an amazing amount of work!
